issue.title: Save gazebo log file for each test in Jenkins

content.raw:
I'm not in favour of modifying our copy of gtest for several reasons: increase the maintenance effort and make us incompatible with using external gtest library.

I think that we could go with name and test_case_name. @scpeters what do you think about creating a test fixture that makes the gzInitLog call automatically (with the log filename configured to the name of the test) in the SetUp method?

UPDATE: something like [this](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/log_filenames..default#diff)?
content.html:
I'm not in favour of modifying our copy of gtest for several reasons: increase the maintenance effort and make us incompatible with using external gtest library.

I think that we could go with name and test_case_name. @scpeters what do you think about creating a test fixture that makes the gzInitLog call automatically (with the log filename configured to the name of the test) in the SetUp method?

UPDATE: something like this?
